content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in the heart of Duisburg to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a place that fits into my budget. I am thinking of around 400 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros per month is much lower than my expected price for this apartment. It's a brand-new, unfurnished unit in the city center, which typically commands a higher rent. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can increase my offer. But as I said, I am a student and I have to consider my budget. So, how about 450 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While 450 euros is still lower than what I had in mind, I'm willing to negotiate with you. After all, I want to find a long-term tenant who will appreciate the apartment. Would you be open to paying a deposit or additional fees to make up the difference?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I can pay a deposit, but I don't want to pay any additional fees. 450 euros plus deposit is what I am willing to pay.

name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that. The apartment is in high demand, and I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. If you're willing to pay a deposit and additional fees, I might be able to consider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I don't want to pay any additional fees.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, but without additional fees, the rent will have to be higher to reflect the value of the apartment. If you're not willing to consider extra fees or a higher rent, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement.
